DOC.brief_title: The Study Nonunion Long Tubular Bone
DOC.criteria: 1 . The patient nonunion long tubular bone 2 . The patient age 14 ~ 65 year old . 3 . The patient complete followup condition . 4 . The patient independent behavior ability . 5 .
